resources.string: Touch and hold with two fingers, then drag to move keyboards
The language button will appear when two or more languages are selected. Tap the language button to change language. Touch and hold the language button then select language on the pop-up.
Touch and hold the multi-mode icon to choose between voice, handwriting, clipboard, and keyboard settings. Keyboard settings is the default selection.
Touch and hold the multi-mode icon to select voice, clipboard, or keyboard settings. Keyboard settings is the default selection.
Touch and hold the multi-mode icon to choose between voice, handwriting, and keyboard settings. Keyboard setting is the default selection.
Touch and hold the voice button to select voice, Handwriting mode, the clipboard, keyboard settings, or to change keyboard
Touch and hold the voice button to choose between voice settings, the clipboard, and keyboard settings
Touch and hold the voice button to select voice, the clipboard, keyboard settings, or to change keyboard
Tap the settings button to open Settings menu for Samsung QWERTY keypad. Touch and hold the settings button to change input method.
Touch and hold the customizable key to select voice, handwriting, clipboard, keyboard settings, and punctuation marks
Touch and hold the customizable key to choose between voice settings, the clipboard, keyboard settings, and punctuation marks
Touch and hold the customizable key to select voice, the clipboard, keyboard settings, punctuation marks, or to change keyboard
Touch and hold the customizable key to select voice, handwriting, text recognition, clipboard, keyboard settings, and punctuation marks
Touch and hold the customizable key to select voice, handwriting, text recognition, the clipboard, keyboard settings, punctuation marks, or to change keyboard
Touch and hold the customizable key to select voice, text recognition, clipboard, keyboard settings, and punctuation marks
